title: The Amulet
description: For the most part, Ulysses Shade was just looking for some time to get in some fishing when he wasn't working as a part-time Detective in the City of Angels. All that changed when he opened an email from his long-time friend, Dr. Jessica Rinaldi, a palentologist at the LA Le Brea Tar Pits. And when he saw what she had discovered there...no one would be fishing any time soon! This would begin a wild, wooly, wacky and dangerous worldwide mission that would take them and their allies deep into the realm of mystical encounters and supernatural evils that could challenge mankinds very existance. But first, Ulysses needed to get a damn good hot dog! Have a bite and come on along!
author: Michael Christian
